title: LSA's Todd Ramasar on NBA Offseason, Evolution of League
itunes:title: LSA's Todd Ramasar on NBA Offseason, Evolution of League
description:
The NBA Summer League and Draft are all wrapped up, and most of the big names in free agency are off the market. Jason, Barr, and Lynch discuss the busy NBA offseason and the the evolution of the league with Todd Ramasar, founder & CEO Life Sports Agency.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
